The ladies in our lives take care of us in ways that we might not even think about. Our mothers, sisters, partners and female friends are always there for us when we need them. But it’s not always easy to tell them how much we appreciate who they are and what they do. That’s why I’ve put together some ways to say “thank you” that you might not have thought to try.
Ways to say “thank you” at home
  • Get up early and make a special breakfast. Who doesn’t love waking up to delicious smells coming from the kitchen? You could go all out and treat your loved ones to bacon, eggs, sausages and roast tomato, or you could stick to a simple breakfast of toast and coffee. What matters most is that it’s from the heart. Browse HomeChoice breakfast packs.
  • Do the grocery shopping. Accompany your loved one when she goes to buy groceries. She’ll love it if you drive her there, push the trolley and carry heavy bags for her. You could even offer to go to the shops so she doesn’t have to.
  • Play her favourite songs. Secretly put together a playlist of your lady’s favourite songs. When she seems sad or stressed, put the music on – soon you’ll see her smile again.
  • Offer to babysit. If you have a family member young enough to need babysitting, offer to take care of them for a few hours so that their caregiver can get some much-needed rest. Another good idea is to give your loved one a gift that makes caring for the baby a little bit easier. Browse HomeChoice baby products.
  • Do the things she doesn’t have time to do. Ask your loved one what she would like done around the house or garden and then get around to it as quickly as you can so that she feels like she’s a priority.
  • Offer to pay. Offering to pay for things she needs shows that her health and wellbeing are important to you.
  • Make dinner or order takeout. If you aren’t the household cook, give your loved one a break by offering to make dinner or surprising her with takeout in the spur of the moment. You can turn it into a special occasion by laying the table with your best dinnerware (even if you’re only eating KFC). Browse HomeChoice dinnerware.
  • Turn off your phone. When you’re spending time with her, turn off your phone so you won’t be distracted by it. Your undivided attention will make her feel like the most important person in the world.
  • Lend a helping hand. If you see a loved one cleaning, washing the dishes or doing the laundry, offer to help. Two sets of hands make almost any job quicker and more enjoyable. For extra brownie points, buy her an appliance that will save her time and energy when she’s doing chores and you’re not there to help. Browse HomeChoice appliances.
  • Leave sweets around the house. This is fun for everyone because you never know when someone will find a sweet or even who will find it. Each time it happens, you’ll be the reason your loved one smiles.
  • Bake her favourite dessert. Treat her with something sweet you made especially for her, or if your loved one enjoys baking as a hobby, get her some handy kitchen gadgets to encourage her to bake for herself more often. Browse HomeChoice kitchen appliances.
  • Support her interests. Even if you don’t enjoy the same things she does, by taking an interest in her hobbies, you’ll encourage her to spend time on her own happiness and not only the happiness of others.

Ways to say “thank you” from far away
  • Call or message her just to say “hi”. Just showing that you’re thinking of her will brighten her day.
  • Send her a photo or video. If something reminds you of her or you find yourself doing something she taught you, record it to show her you listen when she speaks. Browse HomeChoice smartphones.
  • Send her flowers. Most ladies enjoy receiving of a bunch of flowers or a beautiful pot plant. If you do this at the spur of the moment rather than waiting for a special occasion, you’re sure to make any day a special day.
  • Dedicate a song to her on the radio. Even if it’s just a silly song that brings back memories, she’ll love reliving those memories with you. Just make sure she’s listening at the right time. Browse HomeChoice hi-fis and speakers.

Remember that every day is the perfect time to show someone you care. Keep reminding the ladies in your life that they’re special to you by thanking them in all these ways and more, because after all…
